description: Make a big batch of this vegan spiced pumpkin soup and have a healthy lunch sorted for the week.
name: Spicy Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the pumpkin seeds in a dry pan for 2-3 minutes, shaking often. Divide the soup between 4 bowls, top with pumpkin seeds and serve.
